rows.description: Talos, God of storms, destruction, rebellion, conflagration, earthquakes, vortices (Chaotic Evil)}
Asmodeus, God of sin, King of the Nine Hells (Lawful Evil)}
Bane, God of hatred, fear and tiranny (Lawful Evil)}
Cyric, God of murder, lies, intrigue, strife, deception, illusion (Chaotic Evil)}
Lolth, Goddess of drows, spiders, darkness, chaos, evil, assassination (Chaotic Evil)}
Shar, Goddess of dark, night, loss, forgetfulness, unrevealed secrets, caverns, dungeons, the Underdark (NE)}
